qas.question: Which travellers are exempt from quarantine ?

answers.text: Travellers who have received their final vaccination for COVID-19 more than 10 days ago

qas.question: What are you required to show alongside the proof of vaccination?

paragraphs.context: Travellers who have received their final vaccination for COVID-19 more than 10 days ago, are exempt from quarantine. It is required to show proof of vaccination, including the dates.

answers.text: Travellers who hold documents equivalent to the 'EU Digital COVID Certificate' (EUDCC)

qas.question: What do you need to hold to enter romania?

answers.text: documents equivalent to the 'EU Digital COVID Certificate' (EUDCC)

qas.question: What do the documents need to meet?

answers.text: the requirements listed above for the EUDCC

paragraphs.context: Travellers who hold documents equivalent to the 'EU Digital COVID Certificate' (EUDCC) that meet the requirements listed above for the EUDCC can enter Romania at the same conditions.

qas.question: What do you need to carry at all times?

paragraphs.context: Road transit across or through Romania is possible. Carry your passport at all times.

qas.question: What rights do holders of the eu digital covid certificate have?

answers.text: the same rights as citizens of the visited Member State

paragraphs.context: When travelling, holders of the EU Digital COVID Certificate will have the same rights as citizens of the visited Member State who have been vaccinated, tested or recovered.
